Post.title: GhostAPI
Post._content:
# Ghost API 
0.5.8API `language``en_US``zh_CN`
`http://your.blog.site:port`  
ChromePostman
![](/images/ghost/postman.png)
## 
POST `/ghost/api/v0.1/authentication/token`
ACCEPT json
DATA
```
grant_type:password
username:your.email@email.com()
password:your_password()
client_id:ghost-admin
```
RESULT
```
{
  access_token: 'xxx',
  expires_in: 3600,
  refresh_token: 'xxx',
  token_type: "Bearer"
}

```

```
status: 404
errors[0]: {message: 'xxx', type: 'xxxError'}
```

HTTP`access_token`
```
Request Headers
Authorization: Bearer your_access_token
```
Authorization
## 
GET `/ghost/api/v0.1/users/me/?status=all&include=roles`
ACCEPT json
Authorization 
RESULT
```
{
	accessibility: null
	bio: null
	cover: null
	created_at: "2015-02-08T12:11:34.683Z"
	created_by: 1
	email: "your.email@email.com"
	id: 1
	image: null
	language: "en_US"
	last_login: "2015-03-18T08:55:30.330Z"
	location: null
	meta_description: null
	meta_title: null
	name: ""
	roles: [{id: 4, uuid: "9227adb4-a836-4f6c-ba41-7d5dd307968a", name: "Owner", description: "Blog Owner",}]
	slug: "your-slug"
	status: "active"
	updated_at: "2015-03-18T08:55:30.331Z"
	updated_by: 1
	uuid: "xxxx-uuid"
	website: null
}
```


api`/ghost/api/v0.1`
## 
json
```
{
    "key": "fileStorage",
    "value": true
}
```
* GET /configuration 
* GET /configuration/:key ID

## 
(2,3Ghost)  
1. `/tags/?limit=all`
2. title`/slugs/post/:inputed-title`slug
3. `/posts/?include=tags`
```
{
    posts: [
        {
            title: 'xxx',
            slug: 'xxx', // slug
            markdown: 'xxx', // markdown
            image: 'xxx', // 
            featured: false, // 
            page: false, //
            status: "draft", // published
            language: "en_US", // 
            meta_title: null, // meta
            meta_description: null,
            author: "1", // id
            published_by: null, // 
            tags:[ // 
                {
                    description: null
                    hidden: false
                    image: null
                    meta_description: null
                    meta_title: null
                    name: "tag1"
                    post_count: null
                    slug: null // taguuidslug
                    uuid: null
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
```
idid`/posts/:id?include=tags`

json
```
{
  slug: "welcome-to-ghost", // 
  status: "published", //   
  id: 1, // ID
  uuid: "xxxx-xxxx", // UUID
  title: "Welcome to Ghost", // 
  markdown: xxx // markdown
  html: xxx // html
  image: null, // 
  featured: false, // 
  page: false, // 
  language: "en_US", // 
  meta_title: null, // metatitle
  meta_description: null, // metadescription
  created_at: "2015-02-08T12:11:20.645Z",
  created_by: 1,
  updated_at: "2015-02-08T12:11:20.645Z",
  updated_by: 1,
  published_at: "2015-02-08T12:11:20.684Z",
  published_by: 1,
  author: 1,
  url: "/welcome-to-ghost/"
}
```
* GET /posts 
* POST /posts 
* GET /posts/:id ID
* GET /posts/slug/:slug 
* PUT /posts/:id 
* DEL /posts/:id ID

## 
json
```
{
    "settings": [
        {
            "id": 5,
            "uuid": "xxxx-xxxx",
            "key": "title",
            "value": "My blog",
            "type": "blog",
            "created_at": "2015-02-08T12:11:35.040Z",
            "created_by": 1,
            "updated_at": "2015-03-18T09:47:42.464Z",
            "updated_by": 1
        },
        ...
        {
            "key": "availableThemes", // 
            "value": [
                {
                    "name": "casper",
                    "package": {
                        "name": "Casper",
                        "version": "1.1.5"
                    },
                    "active": true
                }
            ],
            "type": "theme"
        },
        {
            "key": "availableApps", // appapp
            "value": [],
            "type": "app"
        }
    ],
    "meta": {}
}
```
* GET /settings 
* GET /settings/:key key
* PUT /settings 

## 
json
```
{
    email: "your.email@email.com",
    id: 1,
    uuid: "xxxx-xxxx",
    name: "",
    slug: "exxx", // slughttp://your.blog.site/author/:slug
    image: null, // 
    cover: null, // 
    bio: null, // 
    website: null,
    location: null,
    accessibility: null, // 
    status: "active",
    language: "en_US",
    meta_title: null,
    meta_description: null,
    last_login: "2015-03-18T10:11:18.753Z",
    created_at: "2015-02-08T12:11:34.683Z",
    created_by: 1,
    updated_at: "2015-03-18T10:11:18.753Z",
    updated_by: 1
}
```
* GET /users 
* GET /users/:id Id
* GET /users/slug/:slug slug
* GET /users/email/:email 
* PUT /users/password 
* PUT /users/owner ()
* PUT /users/:id id
* POST /users 
* del /users/:id 

## 
json
```
{
    "id": 1,
    "uuid": "xxxx-xxxx",
    "name": "Getting Started",
    "slug": "getting-started",
    "description": null,
    "image": null,
    "hidden": false,
    "meta_title": null,
    "meta_description": null,
    "created_at": "2015-02-08T12:11:20.685Z",
    "created_by": 1,
    "updated_at": "2015-02-08T12:11:20.685Z",
    "updated_by": 1,
    "parent": null
}
```
* GET /tags 
* GET /tags/:id Id
* POST /tags 
* PUT /tags/:id ID
* del /tags/:id ID

## 
json
```
{
    "id": 1,
    "uuid": "1b925c9f-92f2-45b3-9828-9244adbaaddc",
    "name": "Administrator",
    "description": "Administrators",
    "created_at": "2015-02-08T12:11:20.687Z",
    "created_by": 1,
    "updated_at": "2015-02-08T12:11:20.687Z",
    "updated_by": 1
}
```
* GET /roles/ 

## Slugs
* GET /slugs/:type/:name 

## 
json
```
{
    "uuid": "casper",
    "name": "Casper",
    "version": "1.1.5",
    "active": true
}
```
* GET /themes 
* PUT /themes/:name 

## 
json
```
{
    notifications: [
        {
	        dismissible true,
	        location: 'bottom',
            type': 'info', // 'error', 'success', 'warn' and 'info'
	        message: 'message'
	    }
    ]
}
```
* GET /notifications
* POST /notifications
* del /notifications/:id

## DB

* GET /db
* POST /db
* del /db

## 

* POST /mail 
* POST /mail/test 

## 

* POST /authentication/passwordreset
* PUT /authentication/passwordreset
* POST /authentication/invitation
* GET /authentication/invitation
* POST /authentication/setup
* GET /authentication/setup
* POST /authentication/token
* POST /authentication/revoke

## 
* POST /uploads
  uploadimage file

1.SSHCentOS 6 64
2.y
```
yum install libtool automake autoconf gcc-c++ openssl-devel
```
3./homelatazu`latazu`nodejsghost
```
cd /home
mkdir latazu
cd latazu
wget http://nodejs.org/dist/v0.10.36/node-v0.10.36.tar.gz
wget http://cdn.diancloud.com/ghost/releases/Ghost-0.5.8-zh.zip
```
4.nodejsmake
```
tar zxvf node-v0.10.36.tar.gz
cd node-v0.10.36
./configure
make && make install
```
5.ghostghost`config.js`
```
cd ../
unzip Ghost-0.5.8-zh.zip -d ghost
cd ghost
cp config.example.js config.js
vi config.js
```

6.
```
npm install --production
```
*npmglibc["libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.14' not found"glibc](http://www.cnblogs.com/gw811/p/3676856.html)glibc*

7.Ghostforever
```
export NODE_ENV=production
npm install -g forever
forever start index.js
```
8.Nginx
```
rpm -Uvh http://nginx.org/packages/centos/6/noarch/RPMS/nginx-release-centos-6-0.el6.ngx.noarch.rpm
yum install nginx
```
nginx`ghost.conf`
```
mkdir /etc/nginx/logs
vi /etc/nginx/conf.d/ghost.conf

server {
	listen       80;
    server_name  www.renshiwo.me renshiwo.me;
	charset      utf-8;
	access_log   logs/ghost.log;
	location / {
		proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
		proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
		proxy_set_header Host $http_host;
		proxy_set_header X-NginX-Proxy true;

		proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:2368;
		proxy_redirect off;
	}
}

```
9.nginx
```
service start nginx
chkconfig nginx on
```

OK!~

## 
`Gogs``sqlite`mysqlclonepushshell[Push local Git repo to new remote including all branches and tags](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6865302/push-local-git-repo-to-new-remote-including-all-branches-and-tags)
```shell
#!/bin/sh
sourceProtocal='http://'
sourcePrefix='192.168.10.240:3000/'
targetPrefix='git@192.168.10.240:'
array=(
  org/repo.git
  org/repo1.git
)
for repository in ${array[@]}; do
  # usernamepassword
  source=${sourceProtocal}username:password@${sourcePrefix}${repository}
  target=${targetPrefix}${repository}
  tmp=${repository##*/}
  dir=${tmp%.git*}
  git clone ${source}
  cd ${dir}
  git remote add target ${target}
  for remote in `git branch -r | grep -v master `; do
    git checkout --track remotes/$remote
  done
  # git push target '*:*'
  git push target --all
  git push target --tags
  echo 'source '${source}' clone OK.'
  cd ../
done
```

`Gogs``sqlite`mysqlclonepushshell[Push local Git repo to new remote including all branches and tags](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6865302/push-local-git-repo-to-new-remote-including-all-branches-and-tags)
```shell
#!/bin/sh
sourceProtocal='http://'
sourcePrefix='192.168.10.240:3000/'
targetPrefix='git@192.168.10.240:'
array=(
  org/repo.git
  org/repo1.git
)
for repository in ${array[@]}; do
  # usernamepassword
  source=${sourceProtocal}username:password@${sourcePrefix}${repository}
  target=${targetPrefix}${repository}
  tmp=${repository##*/}
  dir=${tmp%.git*}
  git clone ${source}
  cd ${dir}
  git remote add target ${target}
  for remote in `git branch -r | grep -v master `; do
    git checkout --track remotes/$remote
  done
  # git push target '*:*'
  git push target --all
  git push target --tags
  echo 'source '${source}' clone OK.'
  cd ../
done
```

root    ALL=(ALL)     ALL
```

Post._content: > http://www.cnblogs.com/whoamme/p/3494128.html 1. ``` yum -y install pam vsftpd db4 db4-utils ``` 2.ftp ``` useradd -d /home/xxx -s /sbin/nologin vuser_ftp ``` `/home/xxx``/sbin/nologin`shell `vuser_ftp`web`httpd` `www apapche web`~ 3.ftp`login.txt` ``` vi /etc/vsftpd/login.txt user1 pwd1 user2 pwd2 ``` 4.db_load ``` db_load -T -t hash -f /etc/vsftpd/login.txt /etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_login.db ``` `vsftpd_login.db`db_load 5.vsftpd ``` vi /etc/vsftpd/vsftpd.conf anonymous_enable=NO local_enable=YES write_enable=YES local_umask=022 dirmessage_enable=YES xferlog_enable=YES connect_from_port_20=YES xferlog_file=/var/log/vsftpd.log xferlog_std_format=YES listen=YES userlist_enable=YES tcp_wrappers=YES max_per_ip=5 max_clients=100 #### guest_enable=YES # guest_username=vuser_ftp #vuer_ftp # pam_service_name=ftp.vu #ftppamvsftpd user_config_dir=/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_user_conf # ``` 6.vsftpd.conf `rpm -ql vsftpd` ``` /usr/share/doc/vsftpd-2.2.2/EXAMPLE/VIRTUAL_USERS/vsftpd.pam ``` vsftpd.conf ``` cp /usr/share/doc/vsftpd-2.2.2/EXAMPLE/VIRTUAL_USERS/vsftpd.pam /etc/pam.d/ftp.vu ``` `pam_service_name=ftp.vuftp.vu``/etc/pam.d/ftp.vu` vsftpdpam`pam.d``ftp.vu` `/etc/pam.d/``vsftpd.pam`vsftpdpam`ftp.vu` ``` vi /usr/share/doc/vsftpd-2.2.2/EXAMPLE/VIRTUAL_USERS/vsftpd.pam auth required /lib/security/pam_userdb.so db=/etc/vsftpd/login account required /lib/security/pam_userdb.so db=/etc/vsftpd/login ``` `db=/etc/vsftpd/login``db=/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_login`.db.db64`/lib/``/lib64/` ``` vi /etc/pam.d/ftp.vu auth required /lib64/security/pam_userdb.so db=/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_login account required /lib64/security/pam_userdb.so db=/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_login ``` 7.`vsftpd.conf``user_config_dir=/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_user_conf` `/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_user_conf` ``` mkdir /etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_user_conf ``` `/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_user_conf``login.txt`user1 user2 ``` vi /etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_user_conf/user1 anon_world_readable_only=no #yes write_enable=yes # anon_upload_enable=yes # anon_mkdir_write_enable=yes # anon_other_write_enable=yes # local_root=/home/xxx #FTPxxx ``` user2 8.OKvsftpd ``` service vsftpd restart ```
